name: Remember me (itch) (Justyna)
description:
Alex, a 9 year old, has to come to terms with a recent tragic event which occurred in his life. Help him remember, face loss, confusion and his inner demons.

Made for 16th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam

⠀ Controls: Interact Enter / Z / Mouse Left Click
Walk Arrow Keys / Mouse Left Click
RunShift + Arrow Keys ⠀ Credits: The team:

Emilia Majmurek 

Natalia Sokoła

Weronika Rudzińska

Justyna Zielińska-Loek

Assets used:

Top Down Pixel Art Horror by AnisAous

Kitchen assets from Avy's MV Assets

News Intro by SoundEffectsFactory
